OrgName.entry: OLD PARSON CROSS TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Association for the benefit of tenants and residents in old Parson Cross and surrounding areas. Organises day trips in July and September. Also organises other events.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: 2nd and 4th Tues in the month at 6.30pm (committee meeting), Mon at 6pm (craft club), Fri at 6pm (people who need help)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
